attributes.additional_details:
We want to see the boats stopped and our country's borders secured. 
We demand the immediate detainment and return of illegal immigrants who arrive on our shores and a lifetime eligibility ban, whereby any individual who attempts to enter the United Kingdom illegally will never be granted asylum.

PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION TO DEMAND ACTION!
attributes.background: The Labour Party pledged to smash the gangs and stop dangerous boat crossings. The British people believe this Government is failing its citizens as numbers continue to rise at an alarming rate putting pressures on our services and creating civil unrest in our towns and communities.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about dangerous boat crossings, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Send the navy into the channel to help stop illegal migrants entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769

Detain all illegal immigrants and put in camping sites on airfields
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736491
